name: escape room 9:break door and room puzzle game
name_original: escape room 9:break door and room puzzle game
description:
This game is the fall of 2016 freshly baked a Room Escape game, well-made game, the first to bring you 10 challenging levels, subsequent levels will continue to update! !
The screen is made fresh beautiful, rich and interesting puzzle set, highly logical, is that every puzzle lovers should not miss the annual fine game.
Can you escape it? Hurry to try it! !
